about_the_game:
Embark on a Strategic Odyssey in 1 False Move - Where Every Decision Counts!

Dive into the enthralling universe, a multiplayer turn-based strategy game that challenges your tactical acumen and decision-making skills. Set in a vibrant, ever-evolving battlefield, 1 False Move offers an intense blend of strategy, competition, and teamwork. Whether you're battling it out in the ranked arenas, climbing the leaderboards, or forging alliances in clans, every move you make could be your path to glory or your downfall.


  • Choose Your Allegiance: Guardians or The Bugs: At the heart of 1 False Move are two distinct factions: the noble Guardians and the formidable Bugs. Each faction brings its unique strengths, weaknesses, and strategic opportunities. Will you uphold the valor of the Guardians, or harness the relentless might of The Bugs? Your choice will shape your approach to the battles ahead.
  • Dive into Campaigns and Missions: Immerse yourself in meticulously crafted campaigns and missions that will take you on a journey through the game's rich lore and challenging landscapes. From the desolate ruins haunted by the echoes of ancient battles to the lush, alien forests teeming with unseen dangers, every mission is a new puzzle waiting to be solved.
  • The Thrill of Ranked Competition: For those who relish competition, the ranked matches offer a battleground where strategy, skill, and a bit of luck determine the victors. Rise through the ranks to etch your name among the legends.
  • Clan Warfare: Unity is Strength: Create or join a clan to team up with like-minded strategists. Share tactics, compete in clan-exclusive events, and work together to dominate the clan leaderboards. Unity is strength.
  • Custom Games: Your Battlefield, Your Rules: With custom games, you have the power to create your ideal battlefield. Set the rules, pick the map, and challenge your friends or foes to battles crafted entirely by your imagination.
  • A World of Maps: Unique Challenges Await: 1 False Move boasts an array of maps, each with its unique geography, strategic points, and random events that can turn the tide of battle in an instant. From treacherous mountain passes to ancient, trap-laden temples, every map offers a new challenge and endless replayability.


Prepare for Battle
Prepare to make your move in 1 False Move, where your strategy, foresight, and courage will determine the fate of your faction. Will you lead your forces to victory, or will one false move lead to your demise? The battle for supremacy begins now!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Ventura or later
  • Processor: M1 or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 or Intel equivalent
  • Storage: 369.3 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Nothing Special Here :D

name: Phase One

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-9600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • Storage: 369.3 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Nothing Special Here :D

short_description: Just a Little turn-based strategy game Mixed with some RTS. Master diverse maps, manage resources, and command your Faction in a quest for victory. Your battlefield awaits!
